title: Run Task Result Outcome
description: A detailed record containing information about a Run Task check that has contributed to the overall Run Task status.

outcome_id.title: Outcome ID
outcome_id.description: A partner supplied identifier. Note that this identifier does not have to be unique.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short one-line description of the outcome.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Up to 5 tags with labels, containing data or metadata of an outcome.

body.title: Body
body.description: Markdown text which will be rendered to the user in the Terraform Cloud Run UI.

url.title: Url
url.description: A URL linking this result to a page with more information, provided by the integration partner.
